name: Fluid Sort
description:
Yet another clone game of those liquid / water / fluid sort games with the bottles. This was made because I was tired of the one on my phone draining my battery from all the ads and the fact that it is running with a full unity engine.

You can also play at time-warp-interactive.gitlab.io/fluid-sort/

Intended game features:

  • No Ads
  • PWA installation for mobile / desktop
  • Deno EXE for desktop
  • Extra Game Mechanics.
    • Faucets on bottle bottoms
    • Capped Bottles
    • Small Bottles

This game is currently in development.
